name: sbalv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wal(s2, w0)), wal(s2, w1))

stmt.origin: bitri(wsb(s0, s1, wal(s2, w0)), wal(s2, w1), wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wal(s2, w0)), wal(s2, w1))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, wal(s2, w0)), wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| wb(wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)), wal(s2, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wal(s2, w0)), wal(s2, w1))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, wal(s2, w0)), wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| wb(wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)), wal(s2, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wal(s2, w0)), wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wal(s2, w0)), wal(s2, w1))
-| wb(wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)), wal(s2, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s2, wsb(s0, s1, w0)), wal(s2, w1))
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wal(s2, w0)), wal(s2, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1)

comment: Quantify with new variable inside substitution. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-1993.)
